Recommendation: Consider using Azure Reserved VM Instances to save money on virtual machines
Potential Benefits: Reduce virtual machine costs by committing to one or three-year terms

Recommendation: Enable Azure Defender for your storage accounts to protect against threats
Potential Benefits: Advanced threat protection for storage resources

Recommendation: Configure availability zones for your virtual machines
Potential Benefits: Improve application availability and resiliency

Recommendation: Delete unattached managed disks to reduce costs
Potential Benefits: Eliminate costs for unused storage resources

Recommendation: Upgrade to Premium SSD for improved IOPS
Potential Benefits: Better database performance with faster storage

Recommendation: Enable diagnostic logs for your application gateway
Potential Benefits: Improve troubleshooting capabilities with detailed logs

Recommendation: Right-size underutilized virtual machines
Potential Benefits: Match VM size to actual workload requirements

Recommendation: Rotate storage account keys regularly
Potential Benefits: Enhance security through regular key rotation

Recommendation: Delete unused public IP addresses
Potential Benefits: Reduce costs for unassigned IP addresses

Recommendation: Implement backup strategy for production databases
Potential Benefits: Protect against data loss with automated backups

Recommendation: Enable acceleration for your application gateway
Potential Benefits: Reduce latency with web application acceleration

Recommendation: Optimize storage tier for blob storage
Potential Benefits: Move infrequently accessed data to cool or archive tier

Recommendation: Enable multi-factor authentication for privileged accounts
Potential Benefits: Strengthen identity security with MFA

Recommendation: Tag resources for better cost allocation
Potential Benefits: Improve resource management and cost tracking

Recommendation: Delete unused load balancers to reduce costs
Potential Benefits: Eliminate charges for idle load balancers

Recommendation: Configure health probes for load balancer
Potential Benefits: Automatically detect and route around unhealthy instances

Recommendation: Update TLS configuration to use modern protocols only
Potential Benefits: Improve security by disabling legacy TLS versions

Recommendation: Consolidate small databases into elastic pool
Potential Benefits: Share resources across multiple databases for cost efficiency

Recommendation: Enable caching for frequently accessed content
Potential Benefits: Reduce response times with Redis cache

Recommendation: Implement resource locks to prevent accidental deletion
Potential Benefits: Protect critical resources from accidental changes
